reqs:
STUDENTS REGISTERING FOR THIS COURSE MUST SELECT A TUTORIAL TIME. TUTORIALS MEET EVERY OTHER WEEK.
Tutorials for ASTR 311-T2A are every other week.
Tutorials for ASTR 311-T2B are every other week.
Tutorials for ASTR 311-T2D are every other week.
Tutorials for ASTR 311-T2F are every other week.
Tutorials for ASTR 311-T2G are every other week.
This is a wait list for a tutorial section. Please sign up on the wait list if your desired tutorial section is full or any of the current tutorial sections does not fit into your timetable.
As part of ASTR 311 Distance Education section 99A, you are required to complete the online tutorial part of the course, however you do not need to register for the online tutorials in this DE section.
As part of ASTR 311 Distance Education section 99C, you are required to complete the online tutorial part of the course, however you do not need to register for the online tutorials in this DE section.
courseName: Exploring the Universe: Stars and Galaxies
description: A survey of recent discoveries in modern astronomy without the use of advanced mathematics. Stars, pulsars, black holes, galaxies, quasars and the origin and evolution of the Universe. Not open to first year students and not for credit in the Faculties of Science and Applied Science.
